com.google.code.yanf4j.buffer

类 SimpleBufferAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.code.yanf4j.buffer.SimpleBufferAllocator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IoBufferAllocator

    public class SimpleBufferAllocator
extends Object
implements IoBufferAllocator
    A simplistic IoBufferAllocator which simply allocates a new buffer every time.
    版本:
    $Rev: 671827 $, $Date: 2008-06-26 10:49:48 +0200 (Thu, 26 Jun 2008) $
    作者:
    The Apache MINA Project (dev@mina.apache.org)

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      IoBuffer allocate(int capacity, boolean direct)
      Returns the buffer which is capable of the specified size.
      ByteBuffer allocateNioBuffer(int capacity, boolean direct)
      Returns the NIO buffer which is capable of the specified size.
      void dispose()
      Dispose of this allocator.
      IoBuffer wrap(ByteBuffer nioBuffer)
      Wraps the specified NIO ByteBuffer into MINA buffer.

    • 方法详细资料

      • allocate

        public IoBuffer allocate(int capacity,
                boolean direct)
        从接口复制的说明: IoBufferAllocator
        Returns the buffer which is capable of the specified size.
        指定者:
        allocate 在接口中 IoBufferAllocator
        参数:
        capacity - the capacity of the buffer
        direct - true to get a direct buffer, false to get a heap buffer.

      • allocateNioBuffer

        public ByteBuffer allocateNioBuffer(int capacity,
                           boolean direct)
        从接口复制的说明: IoBufferAllocator
        Returns the NIO buffer which is capable of the specified size.
        指定者:
        allocateNioBuffer 在接口中 IoBufferAllocator
        参数:
        capacity - the capacity of the buffer
        direct - true to get a direct buffer, false to get a heap buffer.

      • wrap

        public IoBuffer wrap(ByteBuffer nioBuffer)
        从接口复制的说明: IoBufferAllocator
        Wraps the specified NIO ByteBuffer into MINA buffer.
        指定者:
        wrap 在接口中 IoBufferAllocator

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        从接口复制的说明: IoBufferAllocator
        Dispose of this allocator.
        指定者:
        dispose 在接口中 IoBufferAllocator
=======
方法详细信息

allocate

public IoBuffer allocate(int capacity,
                         boolean direct)
从接口 IoBufferAllocator 复制的描述
Returns the buffer which is capable of the specified size.

指定者：
接口 IoBufferAllocator 中的 allocate
参数：
capacity - the capacity of the buffer
direct - true to get a direct buffer, false to get a heap buffer.

allocateNioBuffer

public ByteBuffer allocateNioBuffer(int capacity,
                                    boolean direct)
从接口 IoBufferAllocator 复制的描述
Returns the NIO buffer which is capable of the specified size.

指定者：
接口 IoBufferAllocator 中的 allocateNioBuffer
参数：
capacity - the capacity of the buffer
direct - true to get a direct buffer, false to get a heap buffer.

wrap

public IoBuffer wrap(ByteBuffer nioBuffer)
从接口 IoBufferAllocator 复制的描述
Wraps the specified NIO ByteBuffer into MINA buffer.

指定者：
接口 IoBufferAllocator 中的 wrap

dispose

public void dispose()
从接口 IoBufferAllocator 复制的描述
Dispose of this allocator.

指定者：
接口 IoBufferAllocator 中的 dispose
